member.name: PackagePathType
member.summary: Indicates the type of folder path to retrieve in a query for the path or other info about a package.

member.name: PackagePathType.PackagePathType_Install
member.summary: Retrieve the package path in the original install folder for the application.

member.name: PackagePathType.PackagePathType_Mutable
member.summary: Retrieve the package path in the mutable install folder for the application, if the application is declared as mutable in the package manifest.

member.name: PackagePathType.PackagePathType_Effective
member.summary: Retrieve the package path in the mutable folder if the application is declared as mutable in the package manifest, or in the original install folder if the application is not mutable.
